Detailed Description

struct tm holds information about time

struct tm holds information about time, which are returned by some time-handling functions used by kernel (ie. hardware/bios/rtc.h).

See also:
hardware/bios/rtc.h

Field Documentation

int tm::tm_hour

hour (from 0 to 23)

int tm::tm_isdst

reater than zero if Daylight Saving Time is in effect, zero if Daylight Saving Time is not in effect, and less than zero if the information is not available

int tm::tm_mday

day of month (from 1 to 31)

int tm::tm_min

minutes (from 0 to 59)

int tm::tm_mon

months since January (from 0 to 11)

int tm::tm_sec

seconds (from 0 to 61)

int tm::tm_wday

days since last Sunday (from 0 to 6)

int tm::tm_yday

days since January 1 (from 0 to 365)

int tm::tm_year

years since 1900 (from 0 )
